info.name: Eduten Dark Mode
info.description: Having problems with the light mode of Eduten ? So this is for you , Eduten Dark Mode will make your Eduten theme dark . Install it , like it , report errors and I will make more edits to it .
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0 - It's a start !
Version 2.0 - All main bugs fixed ! The background is black on the home page too , now you can clearly view all of your topics and the number of trophies you have won ( which I should have done long ago 😏). Borders are applied to separate sections to differentiate them and finally the logo has been changed !
Version 2.1 - Some more bugs fixed . Now every section in eduten is in dark mode . Applied rounded corners to various divs , inputs and buttons . Notes are in black too now (if someone uses them) . The next update will be related to transitions .
